meanings.sent1: The library is reissuing my favorite book next week.
meanings.sent2: The company is reissuing a limited edition of their popular album.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe they are reissuing that old movie for the third time!
meanings.sent4: The artist is reissuing his classic paintings with a modern twist.
meanings.sent5: The teacher is reissuing the assignment to give students another chance to improve.

meanings.definition: To release or distribute (something) for the second time.
meanings.sent1: The publisher is reissuing the bestseller with a new cover.
meanings.sent2: The band is reissuing their hit single on vinyl for collectors.
meanings.sent3: They are reissuing the limited edition sneakers for those who missed out.
meanings.sent4: The company is reissuing the product due to popular demand.
meanings.sent5: The museum is reissuing the exhibition catalog for those who couldn't attend.
